title: Elegant Stay in Italy’s Breathtaking Sardinia Overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea
description: The azure waters and dreamy beaches of Italy’s spectacular island of Sardinia await. Take an unforgettable journey through rich history, striking natural landscapes and the bluest waters you will ever encounter with a stay at Hotel Brancamaria, nestled in a national park and overlooking the Tyrrhenian Sea. Your package includes daily breakfast, a sumptuous, traditional three course dinner, a welcome drink on arrival and complimentary shuttle service to the surrounding areas.
offer_address: Viale Colombo, 08020 Cala Gonone, Dorgali NU, Italy
